Esther 5:13 And yet allH3605 thisH2088 nothing,H0369 availsH7737 everyH3605 so longH6256 asH0834 IH0589 seeH7200 -H0853 MordecaiH4782 the JewH3064 sittingH3427 at gateH8179 of the king.H4428

Esther 8:15 So MordecaiH4782 went outH3318 from the presenceH6440 of the kingH4428 in apparelH3830 of royalH4438 blueH8504 and white,H2353 and with a crownH5850 of gold,H2091 greatH1419 and a garmentH8509 of fine linenH0948 and purple-H0713 and the cityH5892 of ShushanH7800 rejoicedH6670 and was glad.H8055

Esther 8:17 And in everyH3605 provinceH4082 and province,H4082 andH3605 cityH5892 and city,H5892 whereverH4725 whereverH0834 commandH1697 of the kingH4428 and decreeH1881 came,H5060 joyH8057 and gladness,H8342 had the JewsH3064 a feastH4960 and a holiday.H3117 GoodH2896 and manyH7227 of the peopleH5971 of the landH0776 became Jews-H3054 becauseH3588 fellH5307 fearH6343 of the JewsH3064 upon them.H5921

Esther 9:1 And in twoH8147 and tenH6240 month,H2320 it [is]H1931 the monthH2320 of Adar,H0143 on threeH7969 and tenH6240 dayH3117 whenH0834 [the time] came forH5060 commandH1697 of the kingH4428 and his decreeH1881 to be executed,H6213 On the dayH3117 thatH0834 had hopedH7663 the enemiesH0341 of the JewsH3064 to overpowerH7980 and was overturned,H2015 itH1931 in thatH0834 overpoweredH7980 the JewsH3064 theyH1992 those who hated them.H8130

Esther 9:2 Gathered togetherH6950 the JewsH3064 in their citiesH5892 throughout allH3605 the provincesH4082 of KingH4428 Ahasuerus,H0325 to layH7971 handsH3027 on those who soughtH1245 their harm-H7451 andH0376 no oneH3808 could withstandH5975 themH6440 becauseH3588 fellH5307 fear of themH6343 uponH5921 allH3605 people.H5971
